member.name: ID2D1SvgPaint.GetColor
member.summary: Gets the paint color that is used if the paint type is D2D1_SVG_PAINT_TYPE_COLOR.
member.param: The paint color that is used if the paint type is D2D1_SVG_PAINT_TYPE_COLOR.

member.name: ID2D1SvgPaint.GetId
member.summary: Gets the element id which acts as the paint server. This id is used if the paint type is D2D1_SVG_PAINT_TYPE_URI.
member.param: The element id which acts as the paint server.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

member.name: ID2D1SvgPaint.GetIdLength
member.summary: Gets the string length of the element id which acts as the paint server. This id is used if the paint type is D2D1_SVG_PAINT_TYPE_URI.
member.returns: the string length of the element id which acts as the paint server. The returned string length does not include room for the null terminator.

member.name: ID2D1SvgPaint.SetColor
member.summary: Sets the paint color that is used if the paint type is D2D1_SVG_PAINT_TYPE_COLOR.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

member.name: ID2D1SvgPaint.SetColor
member.summary: Sets the paint color that is used if the paint type is D2D1_SVG_PAINT_TYPE_COLOR.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

member.name: ID2D1SvgPaint.SetId
member.summary: Sets the element id which acts as the paint server. This id is used if the paint type is D2D1_SVG_PAINT_TYPE_URI.
member.param: The element id which acts as the paint server. This id is used if the paint type is D2D1_SVG_PAINT_TYPE_URI.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

member.name: ID2D1SvgPaint.SetPaintType
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

member.name: ID2D1SvgPaint
member.summary: Interface describing an SVG fill or stroke value.
